title: Exclusive-Kazakhstan's oil output declines as exports curbed by damaged terminal, source says
description: MOSCOW, Dec 4 : Kazakhstan's oil and gas condensate production declined by 6 per cent in the first two days of December, an industry source said on Thursday, following a Ukrainian drone attack on the Caspian Pipeline Consortium's (CPC) Black Sea loading facil…
